<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE1644</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Vincent Van Gogh</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Vincent Van Gogh</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Vincent Van Gogh</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Vincent Camionete Gogh</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Vincent Van Gogh</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Vincent Van Gogh</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Vincent Van Gogh</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">The learners will explore the painter by themselves, by using the internet. The learners will get familiar with the possibilities and different kinds of information they can retrieve (text, lyrics, biographies, sounds, etc.)..</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">learning english</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">vocabulary</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">english efl</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Vincent Van Gogh</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">web surfing</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Anfänger erforschen den Maler durch selbst, 
indem sie das Internet verwenden. Die Anfänger erhalten mit den
Möglichkeiten und den unterschiedlichen Arten der Informationen 
vertraut, die sie zurückholen können (Text, Lyriken, 
Biographien, Töne, usw..)..</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les étudiants exploreront le peintre par 
eux-mêmes, en utilisant l'Internet. Les étudiants deviendront 
au courant des possibilités et des différents genres d'information 
qu'ils peuvent rechercher (texte, lyrique, biographies, bruits, 
etc...)..</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Os learners explorarão o pintor por se, usando o
Internet. Os learners começarão familiares com as 
possibilidades e os tipos diferentes da informação que podem 
recuperar (texto, lyrics, biografias, sons, etc..)..</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">I principianti esploreranno il pittore da soli, 
usando il Internet. I principianti otterranno esperti con le 
possibilità ed i generi differenti di informazioni che possono 
richiamare (testo, lyrics, biografie, suoni, ecc.)..</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι αρχάριοι θα εξερευνήσουν το ζωγράφο μόνοι τους, με 
τη χρησιμοποίηση του Διαδικτύου. Οι αρχάριοι θα εξοικειωθούν
με τις δυνατότητες και τα διαφορετικά είδη πληροφοριών που 
μπορούν να ανακτήσουν (κείμενο, λυρικά ποιήματα, βιογραφίες, 
ήχοι, κ.λπ....)..</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Los principiantes explorarán a pintor por sí 
mismos, usando el Internet. Los principiantes conseguirán 
familiares con las posibilidades y las diversas clases de información
que pueden extraer (texto, las líricas, las biografías, los sonidos,
etc.)..</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">erlernenenglisch</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wortschatz</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">englisches efl</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Vincent Van Gogh</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
